entries.title: Crossing the Border
entries.subtitle: Unnatural winter grips Heldren
entries.excerpt: Our heroes answered Heldren's call for aid and stepped into the Border Wood, where the summer heat gave way to killing frost.

content.text: Heldren's council begged for help after patrols vanished near the Border Wood. Answering the call, our companions packed winter gear and blessings for the road.
Within hours the summer heat died, replaced by a razor wind that carried flurries of strange blue snow. The trail of the missing caravan led deeper into the unnatural storm.
